Reviews.Title: It was a great deal..
Reviews.Author: KK
Reviews.Content: I searched everywhere for good deals and found that Sunset Electronics is the only one who is selling for lesser price. (Other camera deals are also cheaper than what out there in market from diff vendors)With apprx. $950..I got really good deal and I am happy with the product. (except Tripod and flash light).Tripod  : Not so good. I am afraid most of the time if it will hold my camera, tight.Ext Flash light : Not compatible with camera, so of no use now.Still, happy with deal and camera!! Thanks for quick delivery and response.

Reviews.Title: I was planning to buy canon t3i the body and 55-250 for almost $900.00 but when I saw the package for $957.00 I went for it and
Reviews.Author: Yonas
Reviews.Content: I was planning to buy canon t3i the body and 55-250 for almost $900.00 but when I saw the package for $957.00 I went for it and to my surprise it was wonderful deal when I received the package the battery was missing and I was not happy about the flash light & the bag I call the company and explain my situation with out any question asked they send me better flash light and bigger bag with in two days. Thank you for wonderful service and product.

Reviews.Title: Camera is great-accesorys so so
Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: The camera is amazing and is covered for a year by canon. I am a photographer currently in school and have been using this camera for two years now. The reason I gave the kit 4 stars instead of 5 is because the tripod batteries and sd card leave room for improvement. The tripod is rather flimsy, the batteries only last about a third as long as the canon brand battery, and the sd cards are slow and not for someone who has a shutter finger. That being said, for the price this kit is amazing and perfect for starting out! I do suggest getting a remote for the camera as well. The one below is inexpensive and still works after 3 years.http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B003GTSHY8/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_7

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Greg Smith
Reviews.Content: This camera bundle was a great deal for the price.  The package contains everything you need to get started whether you are a newbie or a seasoned photographer.  The camera is very user friendly and full of features.  I would recommend this camera to anyone that wants to get the most for their money.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Jen K
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with my purchase. It arrived promply after ordering. Everything was packaged well. I have had a few months to practice taking pictures with the camera and absolutely love the quality of the prints. The package was a very good deal

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Will
Reviews.Content: Its a great purchase, everything is working fine, with a great quality. Highly recomendable. The pictures of this camera are amazing

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: That_E0D_Guy
Reviews.Content: That is exactly what I was looking for! Just starting out, and this Kit had everything I needed and was looking for!
